article_title: Congress Focuses On Oversight And Investigation Of ObamaCare Failures

article_metadata.author: Grace-Marie Turner

og.description: After the Supreme Court’s bizarre decision validating the IRS’ illegal Obamacare rule, Congress is opening a new chapter in the debate over the health overhaul law by focusing on oversight and investigations to protect taxpayers and the rule of law. Action is underway in Congress: The Energy and Commerce Oversight and Investigations [...]
